entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Core 2.1 has reached end of life #199

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segmentation fault when passing byref parameters to tailcall methods #58531
    6.0.0
  • Inlining dead branch elimination doesn't work on pointers #58527
    6.0.0
  • Dump generation segfaults in DAC and doesn't complete #58525
    6.0.0
  • JIT: Slow spills to stack in a loop on Linux vs Windows #58522
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsStruct(varDsc)' for a simple Unsafe usage #58518
    6.0.0
  • [dotnet-dump] dumpobj fails for a stack object from a coredump #58517
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-dump.dll fails if executed by corerun #58515
  • Assertion failed 'tmp == genReturnLocal' in 'TestClass:VarArg(int,System.TypedReference):long:this' during 'Importation' (IL size 70) #58505
    7.0.0
  • macOS localpath ucschars are still escaped #58504
  • System.Text.Json code gen: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.0.0.0 #58502
  • [CoreCLR] Test failure HostActivation.Tests_net6.0_x86 #58501
  • Inbox assets which ship as part of packages aren't crossgend #58500
    6.0.0
  • [HTTP/2] Send RST_STREAM instead EOF if request has Content-Length, but body is not sent #58498
  • System.Drawing Image.Save(Stream stream, ImageFormat format) produces different results in linux and windows #58496
    Future
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms by avoiding the "-windows" RID #58495
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection 5.0.2 versioning #58494
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Process long paths issues #58492
    7.0.0
  • With RC1 SDK zip/tar.bar installed, maui workload install failed in CLI. #58490
  • stelem.ref type check should take the static type of the array into account #58487
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6: System.Random - seeded implementation of .NextInt64* methods is inconsistent with .Next* methods #58486
  • [API Proposal]: Add data log rolling support with the specific size #58483
    7.0.0
  • Test failed file_io.GetFileSize.test1 #58481
    7.0.0

Closed

  • TypeInfo.GetDeclaredMethods() / GetDeclaredABC() methods behavior inconsistent with the documentation on it #56131
    7.0.0
  • Should not `IAsyncEnumerable` inherit from (implement) `IEnumerable`? #58476
  • [API Proposal]: Quaternion.Zero is missing #57253
    7.0.0
  • Mono: handle structs larger than 256 bytes correctly #58190
    6.0.0
  • Test failure ThreadPoolBoundHandleTests.MultipleOperationsOverSingleHandle_CompletedWorkItemCountTest #58151
  • JIT: [QualityWeek] assertion failure with random edge counts on bytemark #58375
    7.0.0
  • iOS: building with LLVM causes some exception catch clauses to not work #56100
    6.0.0
  • [ios][mono][JIT] Are there any plan to allow dotnet full support / JIT / non-AOT on ios? #58115
    Future
  • Invalid pointer address during network call #55010
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Add API to allow detecting when peer aborts receive #58229
    6.0.0
  • [net6.0-android] HttpClient.ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback throws 'Arg_PlatformNotSupported' #57537
    6.0.0
  • There are missing and mismatching cultures between .net and the os #58200
  • Failures in System.Numerics.Tests.Vector3Tests.Vector3DistanceTest on Windows #49824
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Equivalent to ICLRStrongName::StrongNameSignatureVerificationEx from .NET Framework #56976
    Future
  • Test failure: SendAsync_MultipleOutstandingSendOperations_Throws #58354
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DualModeConnectionlessReceiveMessageFrom.ReceiveMessageFromAsyncV4BoundToSpecificV4_Success #58482
    7.0.0
  • [libraries][Android] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates No IndexOutOfRangeException thrown #58416
    6.0.0
  • dotnet paket restore crashes on macos : Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #58473
  • High memory usage with c# dynamic keyword in Windows Service #27537
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert the check for stdatomic.h into a compile step as opposed to existence check #58532
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Fix dump generation segfault in DAC #58530
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Move the implementation of Win32Exception into System.Private.CoreLib #58529
    area-Microsoft.Win32, 7.0.0
  • Clean up tests under CoreMangLib/system/runtime/interopservices/safehandle #58528
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • LoggerMessage formatter performance improvements #58524
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [mono] win32 implementation of g_get_current_dir #58523
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mini] Don't add unbox tramopline on generic DIM calls #58521
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add support for build.cmd -vs corehost.sln #58520
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [libraries] Restrict ILLink Suppression xml to mobile platforms #58519
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58516
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
  • Delete shutdown special handling in a few CoreCLR PAL methods #58513
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Turn off release branch in perf-slow.yml for release/6.0 #58512
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Conditionally build tests, using the conds on which we submit tests to Helix #58511
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix some issues in fgIsThrowHlpBlk #58510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58508
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add support for non-seekable files to RandomAccess #58506
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] [MonoVM] Fix calculation of code size for AOT assemblies mixing JIT and LLVM #58503
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix a few incorrect .NETFramework target frameworks #58499
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Main] Don't always build source build with ci flag #58497
  • Change compile time dependency of ICU API ucol_setMaxVariable to be runtime instead. #58485
    area-System.Globalization
  • Use new Hosted build pools #58484
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reflection nullability API: improve test coverage #58479
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Add `Zero` property to `Quaternion`. #58406
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update CompatibilitySuppressions after updating APICompat that uses references #58208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, auto-merge
  • Delete unused loader test libraries #58488
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Use temporary ni.dll.tmp files with crossgen2 pipeline mode in order to not interfere with crossgen2 itself #57341
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] Conditionally build allconfigurations (#58122) #58493
  • Add RemoteInvokeOptions to EtwManifestGeneration test #58478
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test enhancement, auto-merge, 6.0.0
  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #58465
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] Bring back System.Security.AccessControl package #57816
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, regression-from-last-release
  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
  • JIT: Fix preheader weight computation #58454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix stable pkg proj versioning support #58474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [MonoVM] Fix calculation of code size for AOT assemblies mixing JIT and LLVM #58491
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [debugger] Avoid calling debugger_agent_single_step_from_context when thread is not attached yet #58480
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58456
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [QUIC] Add QuicStream.WaitForWriteCompletionAsync #58415
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • In reset_memory, check settings.entry_memory_load ... #58350
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix X509ChainElementCollection_CopyTo_NonZeroLowerBound_ThrowsIndexOutOfRangeException test on Android #58489
    area-System.Security
  • [debugger] Avoid calling debugger_agent_single_step_from_context when thread is not attached yet #58467
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Re-enable Vector3DistanceTest #57077
    area-System.Numerics
  • Don't always build source build with ci flag #58457
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58253
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Dynamically allocate a buffer for large runtime invoke results #58364
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Delete `TruncateOrSignExtend32` #56904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix X509ChainElementCollection_CopyTo_NonZeroLowerBound_ThrowsIndexOutOfRangeException test on Android #58441
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.14 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #57445
    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [.NET 5.0] Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58412
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.x
  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Refactor symmetric one-shots for improved performance #58270
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rename NGenHashTable to DacEnumerableHashTable to describe its unique feature and remove dead code #58080
    area-VM-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement support for passing a .env file to corerun to easily set environment variables for stress testing. #58222
    area-Host
  • Update native COM server tests to execute directly instead of using the Exe launcher program. #58302
    test enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge
  • More cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #58462
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Run minimal set of iOS / tvOS device tests #58444
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58129
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Request fewer threads in the thread pool #57885
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Pass a null getter\setter with [JsonIgnore] and src gen #58405
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] Support aot without trimming #58306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58398
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Support duplicated type names with src gen #58448
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Fix Console.Write on iOS #56713
    area-System.Console, os-ios, 6.0.0
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ref local in `MulticastDelegate.TrySetSlot` #56842
    area-System.Runtime, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Process.WaitForExit: don't wait for standard streams when process was killed. #48101
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, Future
  • Remove `Microsoft.IO.Redist`. #58359
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Reenable a few OperatingSystem tests on MacCatalyst #58428
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fix content stream read hang #58460
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dead code #58475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #58410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add internal AppExecLink support to link APIs #58233
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Delete redundant AssemblyName test #58477
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Follow up on Scatter/Gather API changes #58447
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    area-System.Reflection

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Constrained GVM test failure in Generics.cs #1484
  • Regression after 6.0.0-rc.1.21405.2 (all versions, include latest alpha) #1482

PullRequests

Merged

  • Get rid of references to RegexSRMTests.DFA #1483
  • Fix compiling with Test.CoreLib #1481
    area-NativeAOT
  • Merge runtime-main into feature/s390x #1474
  • Rename RegexOptions.DFA to RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #1480
  • fixed deep recursion crash in SRM #1478
  • Export debug header with a pragma #1479
    area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Localization of "description" field of manifest file #20497
    6.0.1xx
  • (dotnet watch) - example command is invalid #20487
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 SDK seems to replicate resources from NuGet packages #20483
  • Error for duplicate file with same metadata is not robust enough #20482
  • Publishing self-contained solution yields wrong system binaries in some environments #20450
  • [6.0 RC1] F5 debugging ASP.NET Core broken in Visual Studio due to HTTP 404 #20444
  • Environment.OSVersion returns the incorrect value for macOS 12 Monterey #20440

Closed

  • Workload installer needs to be aware of x64-retargeted packs #20139
    6.0.1xx
  • [ASP.NET] Improve baseline test parameterization #18954
    6.0.1xx
  • Targeting net5 using net6 SDK causes pack failure #19665
  • Static Web Assets build error with .net 6 preview 7 #20008

PullRequests

Created

  • Update `dotnet watch` description #20489
    Area-CLI
  • Add platform descriminator to workload records #20484
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix cross-os symbol generation #20481
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • [Razor] [Backport] Allow optionally specifying an alternative package path when packing (#20451) #20465
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet

Merged

  • Fix bad merge re-apply de34d98c4f282888a257b2941c46e5baaa2cc2f9 #20468
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Doc for build deb and rpm locally #20405
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/6.0.1xx rc1 #20415
    Area-Workloads
  • Do not clear DOTNET_MODIFIABLE_ASSEMBLIES in startup hook #20424
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Allow optionally specifying an alternative package path when packing #20451
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor][Backport] Reenables the ability to set a custom application part factory for an assembly. (#20378) #20447
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow the app to rebuild when a new scoped css file is added #20417
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Add explicit self-referencing type constraint #5125

Updated

  • [Proposal]: [Indented Verbatim String] #4013
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Should lambda expression or method group be considered convertible to `MulticastDelegate` if the delegate type cannot be inferred? #5124
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload not working for cshtml #56092
  • Add record struct classifications for EditorFeatures.Cocoa (VSMac) #56083
  • Analyzer not working using Nuget #56076
  • Code action preview shows "no issues found" even if there are conflicts or issues #56074
  • Html.DisplayFor use null conditional operator ?. #56062
  • API proposal: Introduce Minimum[CSharp|VisualBasic]LanguageVersion for refactorings and analyzers #56058

Closed

  • First-chance NativeIntegerTypeDecoder+ErrorTypeException in semantic classifier/binder #49823
    17.0
  • Unexpected result with string interpolation #56061
  • Exceptions in additional sources are reported at a different time #54185
    17.0
  • Merge ExperimentationService into OptionService #43477
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use NativeIntegerMethodSymbol to represent parameter-less constructor. #56093
    Area-Compilers
  • NRT enable our analzyers lib. #56091
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow converting a lambda with attributes to an expression tree. #56090
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid blocking wait in lsif generator. #56081
    Area-IDE
  • Obsolete Solution.GetIsolatedSolution #56073
    Area-IDE
  • Refactoring #56052
    Area-IDE
  • Move VS lsp client implementation to EditorFeatures for VSMac #56051
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56086
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Track duplicate hintNames as they are added (#55905) #56077
    Area-Compilers

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56087
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #55321
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56088
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove deprecated indentation APIs. #56080
    Area-IDE, Next
  • remove WaitAndGetResult calls from tests #56079
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56037

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1335138 #56075
  • remove WaitAndGetResult from Preview generation code. #56084
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove use of WaitAndGetResult from FAR #56082
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update publish data for P4 and change main to draft until VS snaps #56078
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

    Area-Compilers, Test, Next

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56070

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56016

  • Track duplicate hintNames as they are added #55905
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor HTML attribute smart indentation does not indent an extra level on enter #36065
  • Not able to receive values from Route and Body in a POST call #36063
  • LinkGenerator always returns null when trying to generate link in Integration Tests. #36053
  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure #36052
  • Exponential RAM usage growth on startup with multiple [Route] attributes that specify templates with variable prefixes #36051
  • Investigate Selenium Upgrade #36048
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclose #36046
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #36045
  • "C# 10(preview) + ASP.NET Core Web App (.NET 6.0) + AppendTargetFrameworkToOutputPath=False" produce compilation error #36039
  • Razor Pages Folder doesn't seen to see changes. #36038
  • Consider moving Kestrel shared source test attributes to src\Shared #36035
    .NET 7-Candidate
  • Add configurations to test matrix #36032
    6.0-rc2
  • Workaround for challenging certain authentication schemes without HttpContext #36030
  • ASP.net Core Identity, password settings ignored #36029
    Backlog
  • Allow more oidc-client options to be set in OidcProviderOptions for Blazor wasm authentication. #36028
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR messages are stalled for hours and lost #36020
  • .NET 6 preview 7 Blazor - Mobile device - Streaming compilation failed. Falling back to ArrayBuffer instantiation. RangeError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): Out of memory: wasm memory #36019

  • Generics and Inheritance #29105

  • Blazor: expose 'replace' parameter in NavigationManager.NavigateTo #25540

  • FormatValueAsString() running too often too many times. #35908
  • Adding a component specific CSS file doesn't trigger `dotnet watch` #33569

  • blazor-hotreload.js is missing if `UseFrameworkFiles` is set to a subdirectory #35967
  • Codespaces Hover Contains GUID #24260
  • Detecting when attributes are put on a method called by a lambda instead of the lambda itself #35638
    6.0-rc2
  • VS2019 - Razor Language Services - Shared Project - ".cshtml is not a descendent of the base path" #33550
  • Verify VSCode Razor Component Add Using/Fully Qualify Code Actions #31608
  • Create Blazor Server project, delete '@page' one by one and then type "@pa", press Enter to complete intellisense, it meet error "The name 'xxx' does #30601
  • Race condition with On Type Formatting #30447
  • Unexpected Colorization in DDRIT Testing Env #27117

  • Discuss and Resolve Obsolete Types with LSP #31133

  • Auto-completing `@oninput` with `=` does not insert `""` #27129

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Nesting NavigationPage inside of TabbedPage breaks page layout #2353
  • [Bug] Strange Picker behaviour when used in NavigationPage #2349
  • Issue in Localization #2345
  • Can I use MAUI only on the Windows platform? #2344
  • I have a BIG PROBLEM this days!!! How to build the arm32, arm64 android apk file, the x86 apk cannot be installed to my Samsung Note 10 cellphone. #2343
  • [Enhancement] SafeArea Thickness for ContentPage #2342
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView with WindowsForms: keyboard and focus issues #2341

Closed

  • Add support for JS root components in BlazorWebView #1825
  • JS/HTML change in Blazor do not update build output [Bug] #1765
  • [Bug] Push symbols for MAUI packs #2026
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] Might be MAUI related. After upgrading to preview 5 workload manifests are not found. #1360

PullRequests

Created

  • Have a nicer layout for the BlazorPage sample #2354
  • [WIP] Spike using interfaces and shared mappers to achieve ImageButton #2352
  • Remove previewer's hooks #2348
  • Include Stroke properties in Layouts #2347
  • Update Win2D and Maui.Graphics #2346
    6.0.100-rc.1

Merged

  • [Android] Show entire search bar by default and make it not collapse #2351
  • Remove test cloud if def for now #2350
  • Add support for JS root components in BlazorWebView #2293
  • Set base viewmapper to work against IViewHandler #2339
  • NavigationView Handler for Android #2336
  • Update OutputType to WinExe on -windows #2340

Updated

  • [tests] empty nuget.config when building templates #2281
  • Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled in WinUI Editor #1478
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Implement PlaceholderColor property in EntryHandlers #1513
  • [Handlers] Add IndicatorView handler for iOS and Android #2038
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ForeignKeyPropertyDiscoveryConvention doesn't trigger when a shadow property is added that matches the property created implicitly #25830
  • How to compare json string when using JsonValueConverter #25823
  • Add CodeGeneratedAttribute to migrations/snapshots #25820
  • Enable throwing when accessing non-included property when eager loading #25818
  • Move Thread_safety_in_relational_command_cache out of QueryBugsTest #25815
  • How to use IncludeProperties on HasIndex for a mix of base and derived entities using TPH? #25813
  • Precompiling models and missing usings #25812
  • Investigate timeouts on Mac builds #25811
    MQ

Closed

  • Update SQL Server transient error list #25050
    6.0.0
  • Login Failed for user during Migrate() on Azure. Error number: 18456 #15644
    6.0.0
  • Cosmos: `Dictionary<int, string>` properties do not generate any errors, but don't map correctly #25749
    6.0.0
  • Offset is not preserved when saving DateTimeOffset to Cosmos #24684
    6.0.0
  • InvalidCastException for some provider when cast enum to underlying type in linq and compare to an different integer type in db #21770
    6.0.0
  • Relational: No tests for TranslateContains path #24671
    6.0.0
  • FromSqlParameterExpandingExpressionVisitor incorrect works with (invariant) parameterName #25822
  • context.Model.FindEntityType(Type type) throws "The string argument 'name' cannot be empty." #14267
    6.0.0
  • NRE when adding property named "Count" to a property bag entity type #25485
    6.0.0
  • Entity deleted when required principal is swapped instead of an exception. #22391
    6.0.0
  • SqlServer does not read DbNull for null value in rowversion column #22256
    6.0.0
  • Setting property to null with composite nullable foreign key incorrectly deletes entire row #22196
  • Hang `CosmosQueryableExtensions.FromSqlRaw` from `DbSet` #25778
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Multiple self-referencing foreign keys: Unable to determine the relationship represented by navigation property. -5.0.0-preview.7 #21968
    6.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Configure requiredness based on NRT even if principal end might be ambiguous. #25831
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25825
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Be more explicit about which overloads of HasConversion to use with compiled model #25816
  • More links to conceptual docs #25814

Merged

  • Update SQL Server transient error list #25832
  • Cosmos: Don't map collections as owned types #25827
  • Fix pipeline yaml #25829
  • Query: Convert enum to underlying CLR type in type mapping when type … #25793
  • Fix to #24671 - Relational: No tests for TranslateContains path #25768
  • Don't look for CLR properties on property bag entity types #25809
  • Add regression test for cycle detection using lazy-loading proxies #25821
  • Enable test for Projecting_column_with_value_converter_of_ulong_byte_array #25817
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #25810
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25801
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Use new Hosted build pools #25808
  • Use new Hosted build pools #25807
  • Change Cosmos FromSqlRaw to be over DbSet #25805
  • Configure self-referencing navigations when disambiguated by ForeignKey attributes #25806

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25787
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
